                  com.threerings.riposte.tools.GenRiposteTask
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable
public class GenRiposteTask
extends InvocationTask

The ant task that will handle a bunch of code generation to make using Riposte much easier.

public void setClientlanguage(String language)
Sets the client language in use. Defaults to Actionscript. Valid values are: * "as" or "actionscript" * "java" Defaults to actionscript
